title: SteamOS installed & configured for VirtualBox
description:
SteamOS 1.0 installed and configured for virtualbox.

- nvidia drivers removed
- guest additions installed
- user "desktop" has password "steam"
- UEFI has been configured to autostart steamOS
- Disk image can expand to 40GB

NOTE: If the appliance does not boot, make sure EFI is enabled (Machine > Settings > System). There also should be no cd-images mounted while booting, otherwise the UEFI-startup script will not work.

I did briefly login to steam and look around, so there might be some unnecessary cache files on the disk, but otherwise it's a clean install.


Screenshot: http://image.bayimg.com/5a3fc586040ea4e04eb6e5d4b4684aee60a3587a.jpg


Have fun!
